flawed_nl_solution:
He wants to save $1000.00 and he has $100.00 left over so he still needs to save 1000-100= $<<1000-100=9000.00>>9000.00
He wants to save $9000.00 over 12 months so that means he needs to save 9000/12 = $<<9000/12=750.00>>750.00 per month
#### 750

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 900, not 9000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
